document.full_text: mark wetjen, the 37-year-old democrat nominated to a pivotal fifth seat on the commodity futures trading commission, proved his political mettle as the "general" of the senate floor last summer, shepherding through the biggest financial reforms since the great depression.
document.title: new cftc steward: novice who could break logjam
lines_and_colors: mark wetjen, the 37-year-old democrat nominated to a pivotal fifth seat on the commodity futures trading commission, proved his political mettle as the "general" of the senate floor last summer, shepherding through the biggest financial reforms since the great depression.
